short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Restores the old  DailyMotion player controls

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: THe embedded player (provided by dailymotion) on animexin site has controls that don't disappear or are difficult to use. This extension allows the user to use the dailymotion player(the embedded one) that is similar and easy to use like full player on dailymotion website. This is achieved by supplying the daily motion embedded iframe with the url parameter specifying the player to use (which is neon).
